content: **ariose socks** this sock is knit from the cuff down and features a german short row heel as well as a reinforced flap and gusset heel to allow you to choose what fits your knitting style the pattern is charted but some written instructions are also provided to knit this sock any standard fingering sock yarn will do just fine light colours and solid or semi-solid colourways will make the pattern look best **please be aware that this pattern has not been tested which is why i am providing it for free ** i hope you will enjoy knitting this design
